title: Ticket #7277: all references to python bindings docs should point to the manual
description:
The official home of the Python Bindings documentation is in the HTCondor Manual (yay!). However, we will have lots of links pointing to 

    https://htcondor-python.readthedocs.io

for instance, in the PyPI registry. We should update these links to point to the Manual, and also change the above URL to point to the upstream documentation as well.
remarks:
2019-Oct-09 16:05:38 by jpatton:
Resolved during work on #6907, specifically in commit [57985].

2019-Oct-09 16:07:13 by jpatton:
Actually, since this is slated for stable, this is not resolved. Will get that fixed in stable branch, too, ASAP. When the next wheels are uploaded to PyPI, the URL should change there as well.

2019-Oct-09 16:18:25 by jpatton:
Fixed in [58064] for stable releases. Already fixed in devel per above.
check_ins: 2019-Oct-09 16:10   Check-in [58064]: Change old readthedocs URL in PyPI packaging #7277 (By Jason Patton )
creator: tannenba
